name: Himalayan Mysteries
description:
Discover stunning landscapes, wild nature, majestic mountains and valleys, charming villages and forgotten caves of Himalaya in our new hidden object game - Himalayan Mysteries.
Enjoy searching for items in colorful exotic locations full of treasures and find your way to the secret temple. Different game modes and increasing difficulty can make your Himalayan adventures nice, relaxing and challenging.

Key Features:
- Hidden object adventure game in Nepali scenery
- 37 hidden object scenes
- 16 unique locations
- Over 600 objects hidden
- Match3 bonus scenes
- Zoomable scenes
- Scrollable panel with objects to find.
- Three different play modes: Picture, Silhouette, Word
- Three difficulty modes: Casual, Normal, Challenging
- HD quality of graphics
- Amazing sound effects
- Climatic music closely related with the theme of the game
